about_the_game:
This DLC gives immediate access to all PHOTO PACKS in the CUTIES HACKED game.
30 levels, and 30 new pictures, ready to hack.

Bundle contains:
Aiko Photo Pack
Dakota Photo Pack
Megan Photo Pack
Kitty Photo Pack
Monique Photo Pack
Cypher Photo Pack
Joy Photo Pack
Cassy Photo Pack
Tiffany Photo Pack
ShingCEO_69 Photo Pack

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Sexual Themes

fullgame.name: Cuties Hacked: Oh no someone stole my photos!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
